channel.desc: ID of the conversation to retrieve members for

cursor.desc: Paginate through collections of data by setting the cursor parameter to a `next_cursor` attribute returned by a previous request's `response_metadata`. Default value fetches the first "page" of the collection. See pagination for more detail.

exclude_archived.desc: Set this to `true` to exclude archived channels from the list

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return. Fewer than the requested number of items may be returned, even if the end of the list hasn't been reached.

desc: Returns a paginated list of members party to a conversation.

errors.fetch_members_failed: Failed to fetch members for the conversation.
errors.method_not_supported_for_channel_type: This type of conversation cannot be used with this method.
